## JsPlumbInstance.\_getRotation() method

Gets the current rotation for the element with the given ID. This method exists for internal use.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
_getRotation(elementId: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  elementId | string | Internal ID of the element for which to retrieve rotation.  |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
